title: Does adherence to exacerbation action plans matter? Insights from two COPD self-management studies
content:
Publication date: 30 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 20

Author(s): Jade Schrijver, Tanja Effing, Joanke van Helden, Job van der Palen, Paul van der Valk, Marjolein Brusse-Keizer, Anke Lenferink
